name: Dark Flat Minimal Firefox
description:
This is a style which effects the skin of firefox.
It's dark, flat, minimal and sexy.

You need it!
additional_info:
First at all, this is a collection of different css files i found around the internet. I just adjusted them to my needs. Unfortunately i don't remember the distributors. Sorry, guys. Guess this is for personal use only :P

1. For this setup i have hidden all annoying addon buttons (except of noscript) with the help of the firefox customization tool. Furthermore this style is suggested to people who like to work with the keyboard. On the first lines of this style there is a settings area, which may help you to adjust some minor things like showing the back button and changing some colors.

Here some keyboard shortcuts you might wanna use:

strg + t:          NEW TAB
strg + w:          CLOSE TAB
strg + b:          OPEN BOOKMARKS
strg + d:          SET NEW BOOKMARK
strg + shift + y:  DOWNLOADS
strg + shift + a:  ADDONS
alt + arrow_left:  BACK IN HISTORY

2. After you've learned all the shortcuts it's time to move on! For those of you who want this fancy looking all-in-one navigation bar, you simply have to install the firefox addon InstantFox (https://addons.mozilla.org/de/firefox/addon/instantfox/). Hide the Icon and configure the addon to your needs.

3. Smile! :)

(4.) In case you are a distributor of one of the styles i used, please don't hesitate to contact me. I will then remove this style or add your name to this piece of art.
